Posts.Content: my mam had cancer breast and bone metastasis since 5 yrs . she received chemotherapy textare and two radiotherapy sessions on the breast and the other on the hip the last session was on february 2007. now we discovered liver metastasis the whole left lobe is almost infiltrated and multiple focal lesions on the right pls what is ur advice about the treatment and what are her chances Â
